page.title: 01WEST OF BATH
page.content: This is a beautiful country area immediately{North West}of the residential outskirts of the{City of {BATH.}It is mainly{farmland,}most of which belongs to the{Duchy of {Cornwall.}Most of the small town of{ {Saltford}is included in the area, being one of the link towns between { {Bath and Bristol}on the{A4}road. {Corston and Kelston}villages are picturesque dormitory residential areas, but they have retained the old village feel about them once you are off the main roadways. It is a good area for{country walks.} The landscape is interesting with {hills}in all directions and plenty of {deciduous trees, the river, and wild {flowers}grow in abundance. The people who live in the area generally take a pride in the appearance of their properties.
